meanings.definition: Before the devaluation of a currency.
meanings.sent1: The company sold its stocks predevaluation to avoid losses.

meanings.sent5: Anticipating the market shift, they acted predevaluation to protect their investments.

meanings.definition: Occurring or existing before a decrease in value.
